name: WonderNetwork
overview:
WonderNetwork operates a global network of servers and leverages them to provide network testing solutions. They continuously seek innovative ways of utilizing their network to provide their customers with new and exciting products.

WonderNetwork owns an ever-growing network of servers in more than 70 cities, in 46 countries, on 6 continents. Their first product, WonderProxy, was originally conceived for developers who needed to test their GeoIP-sensitive applications—checking that the correct credit card processor was used in different countries, that prices appeared in local currency, or that location-based ads appeared in the correct locations. Since its founding in 2009, WonderProxy has grown into WonderNetwork, and they have found ways to harness their network of servers for a variety of other uses: Global Ping Statistics provides useful metrics to check latency between geographically distributed servers, Where’s It Up? provides global site status details including diagnostic information (ping, traceroute, DNS), and Natural Load Testing enables developers to test the performance of their sites before they go live / viral.

WonderNetwork strives to provide solutions to the myriad issues associated with global web development. They’re proud to help their clients meet their needs, and build their own wonderful products, while maintaining a cheery disposition and sense of Wonder.
